name: aliexpress.solution.feed.submit
description: API for merchants to submit feed data. Please note for each seller, the recommended number of feeds submitted for each operation_type every 24 hours should be lee than 150, otherwise significant delay might be encountered for processing the feed.

subParams.name: item_content
subParams.description: Content of each item, which follows different format according to different feed type.

subParams.name: item_content_id
subParams.description: The id of the item_content, which could be defined by the seller. item_content_id should be unique among all the items in item_list.This field also appears in the API:aliexpress.solution.feed.query, which is regarding the convenience for the sellers to match the item_execuation_result with the item_content.

responseParams.name: job_id
responseParams.description: job id,which is for querying the job response later.
